name: x3c_sym
title: Exchangability matrix on triplets/codon constructed from nucleotide exchange rates
description:
Exchangability matrix on triplets or codons constructed from an exchangability matrix on nucleotides.

Thus function can be used to build up triplet and codon models incrementally.
examples: hky85_sym +> x3c_sym +> f +> dNdS      // equivalent to gy94
